name: Chat On Desk Order Notifications – WooCommerce
author: Cozy Vision Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

sections.description:
This is a WooCommerce add-on. By Using this plugin admin and buyer can get notification about their order via whatsapp using Chat On Desk.

The WooCommerce Order Whatsapp Notification plugin for WordPress is very useful, when you want to get notified via whatsapp after placing an order. Buyer and seller both can get whatsapp notification after an order is placed. whatsapp notification options can be customized in the admin panel very easily.

PS: This plugin requires an account(paid/demo) with www.chatondesk.com service to send notifications. Demo account comes with some free credits to let you test it out.

Support

Since this plugin requires an account on www.chatondesk.com, we provide 24X7 email support for this plugin via support@cozyvision.com. For new feature requests please use wordpress support forum.

Translation Plugins Support

  • WPML
  • Loco Translate
